sentences.english: The dog flushed a pheasant from the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗於雉從灌木叢中驚起。

sentences.english: Curassows have delicious flesh and are hunted as game.
sentences.chinese: 鳳冠雉是獵禽，肉味鮮美。

sentences.english: When the young hoatzins have learned to fly, they lose their claws.
sentences.chinese: 當麝雉學會了飛行，他們的爪子將退化消失。

sentences.english: And I also went pheasant hunting with the sheikh while I was there.
sentences.chinese: 我還和酋長一起去打獵，很多雉鳥。

sentences.english: Changxing County Stadium in the town stadium Pheasant Road.
sentences.chinese: 長興縣體育館位於雉城鎮體育場路。

sentences.english: A flock of spectacled teals soars over Geumgang Lake in Gunsan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一羣銅翅水雉在金剛山湖面掠過，韓國。
